name: Coloured Paper Twine On Vintage Wooden Bobbin
description:
Add some bright cheerful touches to your gift wrap or craft project using coloured paper twine made in Austria by Paperphine.

Each vintage wooden bobbin includes approximately 45 meters of strong paper twine. Available in the following colours:

- Yellow
- Fresh Green
- Rose
- Denim Blue
- Turquoise

The vintage wooden bobbins are about 11 cm tall and come from an old weaving mill. Each bobbin is unique and beautiful and can be re-used.
